channel.title: Death glitch
channel.description: I have a stupid glitch on my server , if someone kils you , you're hp goes to 0 but you wont die or lose items and you can heal yourself back... any ideas how to fix it? I was told to change ghost timer , but i don't know where it is...:S i've searched for it...

item.title: Death glitch
item.dc:creator: @kristo_21 kristo 21
item.description:
@kristo_21 wrote:

I have a stupid glitch on my server , if someone kils you , you’re hp goes to 0 but you wont die or lose items and you can heal yourself back… any ideas how to fix it?
I was told to change ghost timer , but i don’t know where it is…:S i’ve searched for it…

Read full topic
